name: ubisysSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the hallway light!”
”Alexa, set the living room light to twenty percent!”
”Alexa, open the bedroom blinds!”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill allows you control yor ubisys Smart Home System via Amazon Alexa and the Amazon Echo smart speakers.

Link your skill to your ubisys G1 Smart Home Gateway in order to control your lights and blinds.

You need the serial number of your gateway as well as the configured password for cloud access. You can configure that in the Gateway's settings under "Security", "Manage access for cloud-based services".
